text: Posse is a 1993 western movie. This movie is about soldiers fighting the Spanish-American War. Mario Van Peebles plays Jessie Lee. Stephen Baldwin plays Little J. Pam Grier plays Phoebe. Billy Zane plays Colonel Graham. Posse was released in May 1993. Category:1990s drama movies Category:1990s Western (genre) movies Category:1993 movies Category:American Western (genre) movies
title: Posse (movie)
